actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit donations of surplus supplies and equipment to State and local public recreation agencies.

summary.text: Permits the donation of surplus supplies and equipment to State and local recreation agencies by authority of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit donations of surplus supplies and equipment to State and local public recreation agencies.
